Text:
Ok, "Tammy".  You're 21, and an All-American girl just wanting to trade pics. But you type like a Russian who learnt English in elementary school. You see, here we capitalize the word "I", And we don't like "sport", we like "sports".

Personally, I feel you are closer to a 350# plumber named "Tommy" with a beard and a cigarette hanging out of your mouth, wearing a dirty wifebeater. If you were looking to trade pics, this would be the wrong place.

Tammy, go away and leave us nice people alone.
